item.title: Toilet and rubbish, 1st October
item.description:
I walk past this house on Eden Road, Beckenham and think how disgraceful for the neighbours and the road in general! It has been like this for year's! If it a housing association property, would they be responsible for it dreadful state?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Road, Elmers End, London

item.title: Outside Fitness First Gym and on opposite pavement., 1st October
item.description:
Your reference for this report is 8205344, please quote it in any enquiries. Could you tell me what progress have you made on my report of pavement graffiti in several places on both sides of Salusbury Road advertising Fitness First Gym by the FFGym which is next to Salusbury Primary and the Co Op. Why hasn’t it been removed or do you tolerate all businesses pavement graffiti?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pavement in Middleton Road is blocked by barrells outside the fox public house., 1st October
item.description:
Barrells outside the Fox public house on the pavement are blocking the pavement. At this point there are bicycle stands and an adverse camber on the pavement together with drinkers standing by the barrells forcing pedestrians to walk into the road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Angling, 1st October
item.description:
There was a person fishing in the lake at the meadow this morning. Sorry this didn’t really fit into your categories. We have been told to report such things so that they are on record. They will probably have left by the time anybody got there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Five Arches, North Cray, London

item.title: This part of the pavement never gets swept the road cleaner, 1st October
item.description:
This area outside the Royston Contact Centre, 298 Kent House Road, has never been swept. Sometimes we do it ourselves. It gets very mucky and slippery in the winter and we have children coming in and out of our centre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Penge, London

item.title: Dumped mattress and glass., 1st October
item.description:
Someone has dumped a large mattress and some glass and glass cabinet doors outside my house. I had a booked refuse collection for my stuff to be collected this morning which I put outside last night to be collected and when I went outside this morning someone has dumped these extra items outside.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swingate Lane, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
